      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player player)
               throws TooManyPlayersException
        Adds a player to the current player's set.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to be added
        Throws:
        TooManyPlayersException - if there are already the maximum number of players.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(Player player)
                  throws NotPresentPlayerException
        Removes a player from the current player's set.
        Parameters:
        player - player you want to remove
        Throws:
        NotPresentPlayerException - if the player is not present

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer(java.lang.String playerId)
                 throws NotValidIdException
        Gets a player by his id. The id of a player is of type String and it is unique.
        Parameters:
        playerId - a string containing the id of the wanted player
        Returns:
        the correspondent player
        Throws:
        NotValidIdException - if there isn't any player with the given id.

      • drawDiceFromDiceBag

        public java.util.List<Die> drawDiceFromDiceBag()
                                        throws DiceBagException
        Method that draws a quantity of dice depending on the number of players of the game. The number of dice is the number of players multiplied by 2, all plus one.
        Returns:
        a list of dice
        Throws:
        DiceBagException - if the dice bag hasn't enough dice
